page.title: 20MY SATURDAY AND SUNDAY
page.content: On{Saturday}I sometimes like to get up later than on school days. Usually it is about{8.00am}.Sometimes I have a cooked{breakfast}as it is the weekend.I always watch{television}on Saturdays. Some of my friends have piano lessons, gym, ballet or go shopping. Usually I have a snack for lunch. In the afternoon I like to play with my friends. There are good television programmes on a Saturday evening so I enjoy watching them. On {Sundays}my parents like to lie in, so we often get up a bit later than usual. One or two of my friends have to get up early to go{swimming.}I go to {Sunday School}at 11.00.We often have a roast dinner on Sundays. Me and my friends sometimes have an outing on a {Sunday afternoon,}or visit relations.In the evening I have a bath so I am ready for school the next day.
